item.title: Setting Up Modern Infrastructure Monitoring
item.description:
Modern infrastructure requires robust monitoring. Here’s how to set up a comprehensive monitoring stack:

Prometheus + Grafana Stack

  1. Metrics Collection
  2. Alert Management
  3. Visualization

Key Metrics to Monitor

  • CPU Usage
  • Memory Utilization
  • Disk I/O
  • Network Traffic

Remember to set up proper alerting thresholds and on-call rotations.
